title: Nine Inch Nails - So Far Away (Fan/Single)
description:
fan single for "The Becoming" includes following tracks. I&#039;ll post the artwork as soon as someone else makes it... I suck at it, whoever does it will totally get credit for it!

tracks:

1. The Becoming [5:23]
2. The Becoming, Treason (Remix by Sam I Am) [5:19]
3. The Becoming (Outtake 1) [5:31}
4. The Becoming (Outtake 2) [5:31]
5. The Becoming (Still version) [4:30]
6. The Becoming (Live Hate 1995) [4:55]

part of the fan single project at echoingthesound.

begginer of the project was "something blue" with his(her?) album entitled "Something Blue" which is a single of "The Downward Spiral."
